([[Cairo]], Egypt; April 18, 2000) | World cup apps = 1 | World cup first = 2008 | World cup best = First round, ([[2008 FIFA Futsal World Cup|2008]]) | Regional name = [[African Futsal Championship]] | Regional cup apps = 2 | Regional cup first = [[2000 African Futsal Championship|2000]] | Regional cup best = Champions, ([[2008 African Futsal Championship|2008]]) }} The '''Libya national futsal team''' represents [[Libya]] in international [[futsal]] competitions and is controlled by the [[Libyan Football Federation]]. It is one of the strongest teams in Africa, As of December 2010, Libya is ranked 19 in the Futsal World Ranking. ==Awards== * Team of the Year (2005)[http://www.futsalworldranking.be/awards.htm Futsal
